reflection.q4: Is this aligned with your identity?
reflection.q6: What are you trying to avoid?

notification.body: Respond within 5 minutes. No response = IH -20%

identity.heading: IDENTITY
identity.explanation:
The ideal self you're aiming for.
The exact opposite of your anti-vision.
identity.example: "I am someone who keeps promises and constantly challenges my limits"
identity.prompt: What kind of person will you become?

mission.heading: MISSION
mission.explanation:
The goal you will achieve one year from now.
A concrete escape route from your anti-vision.
mission.example: "In one year, become an engineer earning $60k/year"
mission.prompt: What is your most critical mission this year?

quests.heading: QUESTS
quests.explanation:
Specific tasks to complete today.
Set two quests.
quests.prompt: Set 2 quests to complete every day

excavation.title: 5 years from now. Worst Tuesday.
excavation.instruction: Write your pathetic future in 3 lines if you never change.
excavation.placeholder:
EXAMPLE:
Wake up with no motivation
Same work repeating endlessly
No dreams, no hope, just existing

judgment.question:
Are you ready to escape
your worst future?
judgment.warning: Those without resolve have no right to rebuild

mission.label: MISSION
mission.description:
This focal length reflects who you are in one year.
Why are you here. What will you achieve.
Never lose sight of your mission.

identity.label: IDENTITY
identity.description:
This focal length reflects who you are now.
Who are you. What are you.
Don't run from that question.

quest.label: QUEST
quest.description:
This focal length reflects what you must do today.
Grand visions are only realized through daily action.
What will you do today.

completion.doubt1: Of course. But won't you betray yourself again in the next 5 minutes?
completion.doubt2: Done? But did you really accomplish it?
completion.doubt3: Well done. But has it changed your life?
completion.doubt4: I'll trust that report. But do you have the courage to do it again?
completion.doubt5: Acknowledged. But isn't that result just temporary?

mirror.question: Aren't your current actions affirming that disgusting version of yourself? Acknowledge it and declare one habit you will kill.

gap.title: SEVERANCE DECREE
gap.question: Declare a more painful, inescapable concrete action

death.title: You are dead.
death.sentencing: You failed to maintain the structure.
death.void: Welcome back to the old you.

insurance.title: IDENTITY INSURANCE
insurance.copy: Will you erase everything you've fought for as worthless garbage? Or will you buy back time with money?

postPurchase.label: PAID IDENTITY
postPurchase.comment: You survived. But never forget — your resolve was sold for {{price}}.

identity.title: Your ideal state
identity.subtitle: This is your natural state. No effort required.

quest.title: Only this matters. Ignore everything else.

notSupported.title: WEB NOT SUPPORTED
notSupported.message: One Day OS is a mobile-only application.
notSupported.instruction: Please open this app on your mobile device (iOS or Android).

evasion.q1: Is '{{quest_1}}' done? If not, what are you doing right now?
evasion.q2: What is the most important thing you're pretending isn't important?

observer.q1: Someone watching you for 5 minutes — what would they conclude you want?
observer.q2: A person who claims '{{identity}}' is doing this right now. Explain the contradiction.

dissonance.q2: Does your current action align with your defined ideal? Can you say YES?

anti_vision.q1: {{anti_vision_fragment}} — Did this minute bring you closer or further?
anti_vision.q2: 1 year from now, the worst Tuesday. Is this minute making it certain?

survival.q1: Silence is death. Have you given up on yourself?
survival.q2: Respond. Otherwise, your resolve amounts to nothing.
